questions.quote: They had more than some monies. Many, many monies. And they planned to give a sizable portion of their estate to you and Susan after the wedding.
So let me get this straight. She saw the floss, you panicked and you told her you liked her.
And when is Brother Costanza planning on telling Mother Costanza?
All right, George. I'm gonna tell you. But I just wanna make sure, before---
What are we supposed to do? What do you do on a situation like this? Should we call a lawyer, should we call the police?
Oh, it was just Kramer...apparently I killed Miss Rhode Island's doves with a bucket of water last night.
Oh, we're heading down to protest this big neo-nazi rally. The head of the Aryan Union is speaking, he's in from Chicago. You should come.
He never even called Ed Roydlick. They were looking for someone!
We have no need to speak. We communicate with deep soulful looks.
And what if I don't make the plane? You'll have already left. Then what will I do?
